statements: SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT issue_description, creation_date FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM support_tickets WHERE support_agent_id = 456;
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_date FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 123 AND resolution_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resolution_date DESC
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, customer_id FROM support_tickets WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date ASC
SELECT ticket_id, support_agent_id, resolution_date FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY resolution_date DESC
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE support_agent_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND customer_satisfaction_rating < 3 ORDER BY ticket_id ASC
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, customer_id, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM support_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%network%' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT customer_id, issue_description, submission_date FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 123;
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_date, customer_satisfaction_score FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_date FROM ticket_logs WHERE ticket_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM ticket_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, customer_satisfaction_score FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE resolution_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM customer_support_tickets JOIN ticket_logs ON customer_support_tickets.ticket_id = ticket_logs.ticket_id GROUP BY ticket_id;
SELECT AVG(customer_satisfaction_score) AS avg_satisfaction_score, MAX(customer_satisfaction_score) AS max_satisfaction_score FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(customer_satisfaction_score) AS total_satisfaction_score FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT resolve_timestamp, issue_description, create_timestamp FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT comment_text, commenter_name FROM ticket_comments WHERE ticket_id = 202 ORDER BY comment_timestamp ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, satisfaction_score, feedback FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score > 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC, ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, create_timestamp FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE create_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, resolve_timestamp FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE resolve_timestamp IS NULL;

SELECT ticket_comments.comment_id, ticket_comments.comment_text, ticket_comments.commenter_name, customer_support_tickets.issue_description FROM ticket_comments INNER JOIN customer_support_tickets ON ticket_comments.ticket_id = customer_support_tickets.ticket_id;

SELECT customer_support_tickets.ticket_id, customer_support_tickets.customer_id, customer_support_tickets.issue_description, customer_satisfaction.satisfaction_score FROM customer_support_tickets LEFT JOIN customer_satisfaction ON customer_support_tickets.ticket_id = customer_satisfaction.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT ticket_number, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT ticket_id, log_text FROM ticket_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_id, rating, comments FROM satisfaction_ratings WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM tickets LIMIT 10;
SELECT ticket_number, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT t.ticket_number, c.customer_name, t.issue_description, t.created_at FROM tickets t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.id;
SELECT t.ticket_number, tl.log_text, tl.log_timestamp FROM tickets t JOIN ticket_logs tl ON t.id = tl.ticket_id ORDER BY tl.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT tr.ticket_id, tr.rating, tr.comments, tr.feedback_timestamp, t.issue_description FROM satisfaction_ratings tr JOIN tickets t ON tr.ticket_id = t.id ORDER BY tr.feedback_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM SupportTickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT ticket_description, ticket_status FROM SupportTickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, ticket_status FROM SupportTickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.update_id, t.ticket_id, u.update_description FROM TicketUpdates u JOIN SupportTickets t ON u.ticket_id = t.ticket_id WHERE t.ticket_status = 'Open';

SELECT f.feedback_id, t.ticket_id, f.feedback_rating, f.feedback_comment FROM CustomerFeedback f JOIN SupportTickets t ON f.ticket_id = t.ticket_id WHERE f.feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY f.feedback_rating DESC;
